ygData.subject: re to Bathory and Seamus
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm. as for who s winning the race for highest level SK.. Erasmus on Fennin Ro was 33 last time i saw. and he isnt even the biggest guy on the shard. but then,
ygData.messageBody:
hmm. as for who's winning the race for highest level SK.. Erasmus on Fennin
Ro was 33 last time i saw. and he isnt even the biggest guy on the shard.
but then, they really could use lives :)

as for the druid duel thing.. it shouldnt have been such an unbalanced
fight, but the druid probably SHOULD still have won. remember, spellcasters
are supposed to have great power, especially at mid and high level. if he
roots you and you dont have shadow step ready, you're just a goner. which is
why i suggest that, as a shadow knight, we should all try to find as much
equipment as we can that gives us bonuses to magic resist as well as ac. if
that high level wiz cant root us.. he's in a lot of trouble ;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
